PrecisAuthority to make an EX-GRATIA PAYMENT to the law firm BUCHAN, DERRICK AND RING, of Halifax, Nova Scotia, for the payment of legal fees incurred by Mr. Donald Marshall, Jr., in the context of making representations before the Canadian Judicial Council Inquiry Committee.
